 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הַדָּם‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** ==member, limb== (loan-word from Persian <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.*** [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>Ges. Abh. 28</sup> [[BDB#Fl|Fl]]<sup>Levy ChWB i. 423 b</sup>); plural absolute <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הַדָּמִין תִּתְעַבְדוּן‎</span> [[Dan.2.5|Dan 2:5]] ***ye shall be made members***, i.e. ***dismembered***, so [[Dan.3.29|Dan 3:29]].
